name: Takashi Abiko
body:
# RELEVANT INTERESTS
* GIS - Natural Hazard Analysis, Environmental Applications

* Geology - Erosion and Landslide Management, Sediment Provenance and Dispersal, Stratigraphy, River Systems

* Other Environmental - Anadromous Fish Species Conservation, Human-Nature Interface


# OTHER EXPERIENCE
* Over 10 years working in Housing and Residential Life (Student Affairs) at various universities, gaining experience in the field of higher education and personnel administration.

* Freelance Graphic Designer  

#[Next: GIS Portfolio](http://tabiko.github.io/GIS-Portfolio/)
##[Back](http://tabiko.github.io/Technical-Experience/)
